items.sentence: How much longer are you planning on staying in Boston?
How often does Tom help you take care of the children?
I can hardly wait to get home and sleep in my own bed.
Tom\'s leg had fallen asleep so he couldn\'t stand up.
I would\'ve never done that if Tom hadn\'t been there.
I\'d be very surprised if Tom didn\'t come to help us.
It was not easy to get a lot of money in a short time.
I wasn\'t able to speak French when I first got there.
I wonder if you\'d like to go out with me this Sunday.
I\'d like to study French, but I don\'t have the time.
I\'ll postpone my trip to Scotland until it\'s warmer.
The police suspect that Tom was trying to poison Mary.
The policeman blamed the taxi driver for the accident.
The status of a doctor is very high in this community.
The trip will cost anywhere between $1,000 and $2,000.
Tom doesn\'t approve of the way Mary\'s been behaving.
I just wanted to prove to myself that I could do this.
Even though it was raining, we decided to take a walk.
How can I be sure that I\'m making the right decision?
How do I know that you\'re not going to do that again?
